meanings: develop[build up, increase] one's physical strength

vlive.korean: [파란색 체력이 모두 소진되면] 형이 Z만 누르고 있는 거 아니야? [When there's no energy left] Do you keep pressing Z? 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - EP.108
vlive.english: [When there's no energy left] Do you keep pressing Z?

vlive.korean: [Z키 (=대쉬, 돌진)를 사용할 때마다 파란색 체력이 닳으며] 달리다 왜 멈춰? [Energy levels drop every time the Z key (dash) is used] Why does it stop running? 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - EP.108
vlive.english: [Energy levels drop every time the Z key (dash) is used] Why does it stop running?

vlive.korean: [체력 고갈] 32, 33, 34... [Exhausted] 32, 33, 34... 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.4
체력이 줄었어 그래서.... while our physical energy has decreased. 듣기 View video GOT7 : GOT7(갓세븐) DYEARY EP.01
vlive.english: while our physical energy has decreased.

vlive.korean: 체력적으로 소모가 큰 것들이 생각이 날까요? That we had hard time taking? 듣기 View video BTS : 슙디의 꿀 FM 06.13 #0613FM_0613
vlive.english: That we had hard time taking?

examples.korean: The marathon is a severe test of stamina. 발음듣기 마라톤은 아주 힘든 체력 테스트이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The marathon is a severe test of stamina. 발음

examples.korean: The long climb tested our fitness and stamina. 발음듣기 그 오랜 산행은 우리의 건강과 체력을 시험했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The long climb tested our fitness and stamina. 발음

examples.korean: a superb health spa which includes sauna, Turkish bath and fitness rooms 발음듣기 사우나, 터키탕, 체력 관리실을 포함하는 최상의 건강 휴양 시설 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: a superb health spa which includes sauna, Turkish bath and fitness rooms 발음

examples.korean: In this job you need brains as well as brawn. 발음듣기 이 직업에서는 체력뿐 아니라 머리도 필요하다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: In this job you need brains as well as brawn. 발음

examples.korean: It takes a lot of stamina to run a marathon. 발음듣기 마라톤을 하는 데는 많은 체력이 든다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It takes a lot of stamina to run a marathon. 발음
